sentences.sentence: They had liquor for the adults and sodas for the children.
sentences.translation: 他们为成年人准备了酒，为孩子们准备了汽水。

sentences.sentence: We bought three bags of popcorn and three sodas.
sentences.translation: 我们买了三份爆米花和三瓶汽水。

sentences.sentence: I wish someone had shown me an "after" picture when I was young and downing the Big Gulp sodas.
sentences.translation: 我希望有人能在我年轻时，当我大口喝苏打水的时候给我看看“之后”的效果图。
